Name: Minable & Create / ミナクリ
About the game: World-building RPG 'Minable & Create' is an easy-to-understand 2D screen sandbox game. ● Can be dug Basically, anything in this world can be dug, destroyed, and materials (wood, stone, leather, ore) can be obtained. You can dig terrain such as the sea and rocks, and create geoglyphs using the ground as a canvas. ● Can be created The collected materials can be processed to create items, tools, weapons and armor. Create your own village or town where you can place the found NPCs as friends! If you raise the player's Lv, you can make items at high speed. ● Can be connected You can 'publish' the world you created. Please try to attract many people to your world. You can enjoy it even more by playing and connecting with everyone. See below for detailed operation methods and tips for beginners ● Game help page -pixel.com/minacre/help.html * You can check it by pressing the 'F1 key' even in the game. ● Official page -pixel.com/minacre/ Graphic material cooperation: (C) REFMAP, (C) finalbossblues Copyright ©2021 TODOWORKS,TechnoPixel Inc. All Rights Reserved.
